title: When you're about to run to the rescue...
body:
...Only to trip on a Teemo Shroom.

https://i.giphy.com/media/XFjQCBpP5HLZC/giphy.gif

replies.body: That's okay. I didn't want that half of my health bar, anyway.
nah ill take you all on with not even 1/4 hp bar anyways as a handicap ill scrub you all

> nah ill take you all on with not even 1/4 hp bar anyways as a handicap ill scrub you all

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/de/f8/18/def81836cb64b43aa68b932b5909180b.jpg

As a support main...

Can I upvote more than once?
You aren't allowed an upvote for use at your own discretion. That upvote is reserved for when your adc has already used their upvote and wants to upvote something else.{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
